entities.name: slytherin table
entities.description: The Slytherin table is described as 'hissed loudly' when Harry and his team passed by it. This suggests that the table has a distinct personality or characteristic.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as looking 'even paler than usual', indicating that he is being described in relation to his physical appearance.

entities.name: wood
entities.description: Wood is described as 'urging his team to eat' and 'touching nothing himself', showing that he has a distinct personality or behavior.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is mentioned as calling out 'Good luck, Harry!', indicating that she is being described in relation to her interaction with Harry.

relationships.description: Wood is described as pacing the field and staring around with his team behind him, indicating that he is leading them.
Cho is mentioned as calling out 'Good luck, Harry!', showing that she is supporting or encouraging Harry.
